dmca.title: [ADMINS] Cease and Desist Request - Multi-issues - Aflac-Ref:2.2.115
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Carter 
Sent: Thursday, September 14, 2006 12:28 PM
To: Legal
Cc: abuse; Admins
Subject: FW: [ADMINS] Cease and Desist Request - Multi-issues -
Aflac-Ref:2.2.115
Importance: High

Forwarding to Legal.

-----Original Message-----
From: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Brand
Protection
Sent: Thursday, September 14, 2006 10:16 AM
To: caresite211@host.com; abuse; Admins
Subject: [ADMINS] Cease and Desist Request - Multi-issues -
Aflac-Ref:2.2.115
Importance: High

Dear Registrant/Owner:

 

American Family Life Assurance Company of Columbus (Aflac) is the owner
of the Aflac mark. We recently became aware of your use of our
trademarked word Aflac in multiple page elements at
http://3788.ohdkp.info/ to attract internet traffic to your website.
Your use of this trademark to attract internet traffic is an obvious
attempt to capitalize upon the goodwill associated with the Aflac name.


 

Accordingly, Aflac demands that you immediately cease and desist from
any further use of the Aflac mark on your website. Additionally, Aflac
must receive a reply to this email within five (5) days from the date of
this email as written confirmation that you will make no use of the
Aflac mark in the future. We will be monitoring your website and we
await your written confirmation via email to brandprotection@aflac.com.

 

Nothing in this email shall be deemed a waiver of any rights or remedies
of Aflac, all of which are expressly reserved.

 

 

Sincerely,

Brand Protection Coordinator

 

Ref: 2.2.115

 

 

 

On-Line Brand Protection Coordinator
Corporate Communications
Aflac Worldwide Headquarters

Fax: 706.320.2288
1932 Wynnton Road,
Columbus, Georgia 31999
brandprotection@aflac.com <mailto:brandprotection@aflac.com>  |
aflac.com 

 

Confidentiality Notice: 
This e-mail and any attachments may contain confidential information
intended solely for the use of the addressee.  If the reader of this
message is not the intended recipient, any distribution, copying, or use
of this e-mail or its attachments is prohibited.  If you received this
message in error, please notify the sender immediately by e-mail and
delete this message and any copies. Thank you.
